document.full_text: the united nations' top human rights official called on the united states tuesday to give the u.n. details about osama bin laden's killing and said that all counter-terrorism operations must respect international law.
document.title: u.n. rights boss asks u.s. for facts on bin laden killing
lines_and_colors: the united nations' top human rights official called on the united states tuesday to give the u.n. details about osama bin laden's killing and said that all counter-terrorism operations must respect international law.
